qas.question: How long did Ronaldo remain with Barcelona?
When did Barcelona win a Copa del Rey and La Liga double?
When was the centenari of Barcelona celebrated?
What title did Barcelona win in 1999?
Which Barcelona player was the fourth to win European Footballer of the Year?

context: Like Maradona, Ronaldo only stayed a <a0_0>short time<a0_0/> before he left for Internazionale. However, new heroes emerged, such as Luís Figo, Patrick Kluivert, Luis Enrique and Rivaldo, and the team won a Copa del Rey and La Liga double in <a1_0>1998<a1_0/>. In <a2_0>1999<a2_0/>, the club celebrated its centenari, winning the <a3_0>Primera División<a3_0/> title, and <a4_0>Rivaldo<a4_0/> became the fourth Barcelona player to be awarded European Footballer of the Year. Despite this domestic success, the failure to emulate Real Madrid in the Champions League led to van Gaal and Núñez resigning in 2000.
